title: That Part of Her
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>We have the hell triathlon as our joint practice today.... Kasumin definitely doesn’t want to do it. If Kasumin “borrows” Rinko’s jersey, everyone should help search for it for quite a bit. Then maybe we won’t have any time left for the triathlon, kufufu....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm hmhm~♪ Ah, Kasumiiin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Gyah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ahaha, sorry for startling you nya. Huh? Is that my Jersey?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh, umm, uhh, err.... K-, Kasumin was wondering.... if there are any holes in your jersey....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeeh!? You’re amazing, Kasumin! How did you know!? My jersey caught on a tree the other day, so it ripped a bit nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I-, is that so!? K-, Kasumin is good at sewing, so Kasumin can fix it right up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Thank you~! You’re so kind nya, Kasumin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah-, uhh, aaaargh~~~....! Kasumin will fix it with my cutest patch!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yaaay! Let’s do the triathlon after this, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Aaaaugh~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
